entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -12.3°C

Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Friday: Snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow squalls ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:43 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:43 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
